ygData.subject: Re: NPCs Repartition
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess you can call those informants, but also everybody can become an informant. Let s not make a category out of those. Mercenary is also a good category,

I guess you can call those informants, but also everybody can become
an informant. Let's not make a category out of those.

Mercenary is also a good category, but spies will be included in all
faction plus mercenaries. Bit more realistic in this way I guess.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> SPies-Mercenaries 3
> Police
> Diplomatics
> Pacificus MAximals
> Iron skull Preds
> Traders
> Corrupt
> Minions
> 
> 
> What's Cyberworld?
> How do you name those poeple whose tells info to police, detectives
and crimiminals?
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Thursday, June 09, 2005 6:32 PM
>   Subject: OOC: NPCs Repartition
> 
> 
>   Ok, just to make sure, what categories of NPCs would you like to be in
>   charge of? Please, make sure you set a priority of 1, 2 and 3, so we
>   can give you the categories you would like first, second, or third.
> 
>   Civilians
>   Police
>   Military
>   Scientific 
>   Diplomatic and government
>   Watchers
>   Pacificus Maximals
>   Silver Wings Maximals
>   Bushido Predacons
>   Iron Skull Predacons
>   Traders
>   Industrials
>   Corrupt (mafia-like)
>   Cyberworld
>   Minion (Only the leader (Major NPC), others are drones)
> 
>   (And don't worry about me, I don't mind picking last)
> 
>
